reviews.review: A highly satisfying culmination of the MCU 10 years in the making, although there is still that untitled sequel coming up next year. The ending is stunning, and would be quite moving and powerful were it not for the very likely possibility that it will be reversed in the next film.
well my son used to love the avengers. now you've killed off over half of his favorite characters. what's the point in watching any more??
Ummm....worst ending ever. 2.5 hours of fighting. Blah!
it was good but sad that so many superheroes were washed away.

The problem with this Avengers movie is not that it is confusing, with its huge amount of characters and parallel plots, but sloppily written and lazy in the way it brings them together, with annoying plot holes and lacking in enough urgency to make any death really matter.

For someone who doesn't know a lot about comic book heroes, and hasn't seen all the Marvel films, this film was a bit confusing, but still very enjoyable.

A bit into the film I started to think, 'How are they going to manage all these characters without me losing intersting?'  But they did it, and they did it well.   The production quality was high, the writing was done well, and you could tell the story was well thought out.

The protagonists were likeable, the antagonist had a good backstory, and there were unexpected turns that all felt like they worked.  Aside from the casual Marvel fan who might be a little confused, this film is worth a watch.
The movie is an all out experience. Its none stop. Been wanting a movie like this for so long

Thanos has arrived! And Marvel wasn't lying when they said this was going to be dark. There are still some funny moments, but the general tone of the film is darker than expected, especially since its just over half a year since the funny Thor: Ragnarok. Pretty good action sequences too. Bring on Part 2 already!

Dark, doesn’t leave much room for hope. Didn’t know it was part one of two - that would’ve helped. Do yourself a favor and go see this one next year just before the other one comes out. Really sad to see so many kids in the audience. Lots of death. Crosses a line you don’t expect to have crossed in a Marvel movie
